speaker: Dreadmire Causeway
line: A raised path over half-frozen muck. Reeds rattle like bones in a bag.

speaker: Stagnant Water
line: Black ice skins the pools, thin enough to show what’s sleeping underneath.

speaker: Your Journal
line: The causeway leads somewhere you may not like.

choices.text: Take the next contract and keep your boots dry.
Mark Dreadmire Causeway as a checkpoint.

speaker: Dreadmire Causeway
line: Behind you, the reeds stop rattling—as if listening for the splash you didn’t make.
